fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Carrier Flagship** (Requirement: Use two killing abilities)
- You may now scout a player each day to learn their exact role. However, you must select them as your first target each night.
- You may select which of their abilities you use on a different target. You may target as many people as required by the ability you select.
**Trade Empire** (Requirement: Use four different abilities with the (Support) subalignment)
- You may now target another monkey during the day. They will be able to perform their ability twice the next night.
- You gain Powerful defense, detection immunity, and you pierce through roleblock immunity.
---------------------------------------
- You may only choose one upgrade.
- Roleblock immunity
- Redirect immunity against the first target.
- If your visit fails on your first target, you will not visit any other targets.
- Since your ability is based on roleblocks and not redirects, roleblock immunity grants immunity to your ability instead of redirect immunity.
